body:
To smoothen any line or shape use Multisampling Anti Analysing

replace:Gdx.gl.glclear() with Gdx.gl.glClear(GL20.GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL20.GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT | (Gdx.graphics.getBufferFormat().coverageSampling?GL20.GL_COVERAGE_BUFFER_BIT_NV:0))

and for android open your class file and write : config.numSamples = 2 2 is a good value

for desktopsconfig.sample=3 this will do your work...
title: LibGDX antialiasing
